room_title: Escape room "Hospital of Horror VR" by No Escape Room in Chicago
room_address: 1501 W Dundee Rd #102, Buffalo Grove, IL 60089
room_description:
Several years ago some extremely gruesome events took place at the local mental institution.

Nobody knows exactly what happened and authorities never released any official statements after the hospital was shut down.

The horrific events awoke evil forces and the place became hunted.

Multiple reports were made of awful screams of agony and other spine-chilling noises coming from the abandoned hospital.

The team of daredevils gathers together with the mission to explore the remainings of this sinister place.

Are you brave enough to join them?
